pull.title: API: GetMinFee modes
pull.body: This replaces the fForRelay flag in the GetMinFee function with an enum mode parameter (GMF_{BLOCK,RELAY,SEND}), to allow more fine-tuned fee rules. The end goal is an API for allowing users to customize their fee schedules.

events.message: GetMinFee takes a mode parameter (GMF_{BLOCK,RELAY,SEND}) instead of fForRelay

events.body:
Closing because I don't want pull requests to turn into Yet Another Place to discuss ideas.

Reworking how fees work is a good idea, but should be discussed on bitcoin-dev of the forums before submitting half an implementation.

This particular change _was_ discussed (at least on IRC) a while back when fForRelay was being added. IIRC, we had an agreement it would be a good change, but not of immediate urgency (the immediate concern was reducing txn fees).
